examples: Quercus dentatoides T.N. Liou in Contrib. Inst. Bot. Nat. Acad. Peiping, 4: 5 (1936).
source: CMI, from Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991.  Dates from S.Y. Bao, 'A Brief History of Plant Collectors in Yunnan 1919-1950': 175-180 (1998). See also E.H. Walker, Bibliog. E. Asiatic Bot., Supp. 1: 205 (1960) for alternative forms of name in Chinese script.
